Title: October 2018
Content: 12*p55451a01220* do not write in this area do not write in this area do not write in this area (b) the time period t is related to the mass m by the equation  t = qm r  where q and r are constants.  explain why plotting log t against log m should produce a straight line graph.(2) (c) the student recorded the following data.m / kgt / s0.3000.4160.4000.4750.5000.5260.6000.5700.7000.6180.8000.664  (i) plot a graph of log t against log m on the grid opposite.  use the additional columns to record your processed data.(6)
